drive.label: Drive
drive.value: To protect and serve her home

abilities.label: Abilities
abilities.value: Powers: Super Power (Neo-Therianthrope, 30); Edges: Alertness, Danger Sense, Improved Frenzy, Level Headed, Woodsman, Super Power (Neo-Therianthrope, 30); Weapons: Melee Attack (Claws), Combat Knife, HE Grenade, HE Grenade, HK USP (.45), KRISS Vector (Reflex Sight, Silencer)

biography.label: Notes
biography.value:
Special Abilities:

  • Berserk: Same as Berserk Edge. Only works in hybrid form.

  • Bio-Augmented: Immune to drugs or devices affecting psychics.

  • @UUID[Compendium.te-core-rules.super-powers-spc.Jrzbowqm4koYbWdy]{Fearless} (2): Bestial nature.

  • @UUID[Compendium.te-core-rules.super-powers-spc.Wbyl1AXCL4kgCV4Y]{Growth} (3): Level 1 (Size 1 (8’ tall), +1 Size, Strength, and Toughness). (Hybrid form).

  • @UUID[Compendium.te-core-rules.super-powers-spc.WPIgqeVP2EuxA5rc]{Heightened Senses} (2): Low Light Vision, Smell.

  • @UUID[Compendium.te-core-rules.super-powers-spc.WuYlosql5tC0lJP0]{Hardy} (2): Strong body.

  • Hybrid Form: Neo-therianthropes can change from human to their hybrid form by making a Focus roll as an action—they are unable to use their powers while in human form.

  • @UUID[Compendium.te-core-rules.super-powers-spc.GECF6kJ65dY7whfF]{Leaping} (2): Can leap 4” vertically and 8” horizontally. (Powerful legs).

  • @UUID[Compendium.te-core-rules.super-powers-spc.lg1xwnKIFujTJP7l]{Melee Attack} (4): Claws (+d6, AP 2).

  • @UUID[Compendium.te-core-rules.super-powers-spc.pwLm4AcY63szetMu]{Regeneration} (5): Focus roll every hour.

  • @UUID[Compendium.te-core-rules.super-powers-spc.6teycp5SsVyLtOhw]{Pace} (2): Pace 8.

  • @UUID[Compendium.te-core-rules.super-powers-spc.dsysTI1XulRNSz9g]{Super Attribute} (4): Strength +2.

  • @UUID[Compendium.te-core-rules.super-powers-spc.Jw89Cv9zmiWPnEaR]{Super Edge} (2): Frenzy.

  • @UUID[Compendium.te-core-rules.super-powers-spc.9RUgVZ3OAPgawGYG]{Toughness} +2 (2): Strong body.

Gear: As @UUID[Compendium.te-core-rules.watch-list.OBZPHWjdvsIADS2h]{Phobos Operator} when they are in human form.

Wolf neo-therianthropes can take the form of a wolf-human hybrid.

items.name: Tell Them Who They Are or Should Be

system.description: @UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.vbmelu6amDCsv8Xp]{Tell Them Who They Are or Who They Should Be}
@UUID[Compendium.masks-newgeneration-unofficial.documents.llXD7GIZiU5z5MiG.JournalEntryPage.WDtPMAeq3CIumtrg]{Bring an NPC to Rash Decisions and Hard Conclusions}

When marked: The villain tries to avoid harm or escape.

  • Disengage or flee to a safer position.
  • Throw up barriers, screens, or minions.
  • Panic and lash out wildly to clear space.
  • Plead for mercy, bargain, or stall.
  • Hide or go to ground (change the arena).

Immediate use: Make one of these as soon as Afraid is marked, before PCs act again.

When marked: The villain escalates and smashes.

  • Hit back with reckless force.
  • Damage the scene or environment.
  • Shut down talk; refuse to negotiate.
  • Exploit a vulnerability you’ve spotted.
  • Raise the stakes or widen the threat.

When marked: The villain becomes human and conflicted.

  • Seek forgiveness or acceptance.
  • Sacrifice something to make amends.
  • Consider the unthinkable as self‑punishment.
  • Drag others into shared culpability.
  • Reveal their true drive or wound.

When marked: The villain either gives up or goes too far.

  • Concede or pull back from the fight.
  • Burn everything around them.
  • Grab at any flicker of hope or help.
  • Undermine others’ beliefs or morale.
  • Pivot to drastic, terrible measures.

When marked: The villain wavers socially.

  • Double down on a flawed plan.
  • Follow someone else’s lead.
  • Doubt allies; second‑guess the scheme.
  • Admit wrongdoing—out loud.
  • Fade into the background to regroup.
Leverage the Super Power capability.
Make a decisive attack using the Melee Attack (Claws).<p>Damage: <em>@str+d6</em> · AP: <em>2</em> · RoF: <em>1</em></p>
Make a decisive attack using the Combat Knife.<p>Damage: <em>@str+d4</em> · AP: <em>0</em> · RoF: <em>1</em></p>
Make a decisive attack using the HE Grenade.<p>Damage: <em>3d6</em> · AP: <em>0</em> · RoF: <em>1</em> · Range: <em>5/10/20</em></p>
Make a decisive attack using the HE Grenade.<p>Damage: <em>3d6</em> · AP: <em>0</em> · RoF: <em>1</em> · Range: <em>5/10/20</em></p>
Make a decisive attack using the HK USP (.45).<p>Damage: <em>2d6+1</em> · AP: <em>1</em> · RoF: <em>1</em> · Range: <em>12/24/48</em></p>
